starRatingText: The star rating represents what I feel about being comfortable to work with.
projectAppText: Academic project where I've built a mobile app to present myself
projectDigiMuseuText: Academic project where I've developed a mobile app to make augmented reality tours in museums.
projectUnqueueitText: Academic project where we developed an app to request an online ticket having in mind distance and time to get to the grocery store.
projectJumpText: Arcade game developed with openCV library in order to control the jumper with head movements and voice volume. It consisted in jumping over object as long as you could.
projectStarWarsGameText: Arcade game with two levels as a tribute to the Star Wars saga using the Phaser.js library.
projectCryptoCoinAppText: Mobile app, alpha phase, that consisted in getting information about cryptocurrency and trading market.
projectRestaurantManagementText: Academic project where we've built a system to manage restaurant's reservations and menus.
projectLolTournamentManagementText: Academic project where we've built a tournament management system where you could register all the game's information.
projectTerralvaText: Project that consisted in having geomapping trace of agriculture land.
projectCaptureTheFlagText: Cibersecurity Project where we developed a capture the flag platform, a competition platform where we had puzzles to be solved and we could analyze all the team's points.
projectWebsiteProductManagementText: Summer Internship Project where I developed a system to analyze web production environments and validate if they're running well. An alert is sent to client's and company's email and a report is generated so we could fix any issue asap.
projectMyIMSText: Mobile App for HR management. Collaborators are able to register their entry by GPS, set their vacations and work on their project sprints.
projectPerformanceManagementSystemText: Performance monitoring system developed in order to check all our server's hardware resources and send alerts to our messaging apps and emails.
projectCryptoStatsText: Website to analyze, keep track and check trading information of cryptocurrencies
projectPortfolioText: Website built to share my experience and projects.
projectSideNoteText: Some projects do not have any demo videos or pictures for copyright reasons. Contact me if you want to know more about the development of the projects.
